name: Paws & Claws Dogs & Cats Best Friends
name_original: Paws & Claws Dogs & Cats Best Friends
description:
Enjoy the fun and excitement of having your own furry pal! Give them tons of love as they become your best friend for life!

Features

• Play exciting mini-games like tug-o-war and fetch.
• Feed, groom, cuddle and play with your frisky little furball in the house or outside
• Give your puppy a bath or pet your kitty and monitor their cleanliness, mood and talents
